shortdesc.ph: Sets the output log level of the SDK.

dlentry.dd: v3.3.0ã€‚ Please use logConfig in instead.

section.p: Sets the log files that the SDK outputs. You can use one or a combination of the log filter levels. The log level follows the sequence of OFF, CRITICAL, ERROR, WARNING, INFO, and DEBUG. Choose a level to see the logs preceding that level.
If, for example, you set the log level to WARNING, you see the logs within levels CRITICAL, ERROR, and WARNING.

plentry.pd: Sets the output log level of the mediaplayer kit. See .
